method_identification.method_name: Screening of Veterinary Drug and Pesticides Residues by UHPLC-MS/MS
method_identification.issuing_agency: United States Department of Agriculture Food Safety and Inspection Service (USDA FSIS)

sample_information.source: Animal (bovine, porcine, poultry, caprine, ovine, Siluriformes), Egg products (egg white, egg yolk, whole egg)
sample_information.partNature: muscle tissue, liquid egg products (egg white, egg yolk, whole egg)
sample_information.scientificNames: bovine, porcine, poultry, Siluriformes (catfish), caprine, ovine

sample_preparation.tissue_wash_method: trim away fat and connective tissue from the tissue
sample_preparation.collection_temperature: kept cold before and during shipping
sample_preparation.tissue_processing_method: frozen, temper (partially thaw) the sample while keeping it as cold as possible; grind the tissue until homogeneous
sample_preparation.shipping_details: kept cold before and during shipping
sample_preparation.other_information: Weigh 2.0 ± 0.1 g of homogenized samples or egg products into labeled 50 mL polypropylene centrifuge tubes.

chromatography_conditions.wash_cycles_description: Needle Level: 0.20 mm; Wash Time: 30 sec
chromatography_conditions.internal_standards_added: Atrazine-d5, Flunixin-d3, Penicillin G-d7, Sulfamethazine phenyl-13C6, Ethoprofos
chromatography_conditions.mobile_phase_composition: A: UHPLC Aqueous Mobile Phase (0.1% Formic acid in water); B: UHPLC Organic Mobile Phase (0.1% Formic acid in acetonitrile)

mass_spectrometry_conditions.other_information: MRM Detection Window: 30 sec; Target Scan Time: 1 sec; Settling Time: 20.0000 msec; Collision Gas: Medium. Scan parameters are detailed in Tables 29 and 30.

sample_preparation.collection_temperature: kept cold before and during shipping

chromatography_conditions.wash_cycles_description: Needle Level: 0.20 mm; Wash Time: 30 sec
chromatography_conditions.internal_standards_added: Atrazine-d5, Flunixin-d3, Penicillin G-d7, Sulfamethazine phenyl-13C6, Ethoprofos

method_identification.method_name: Screening for Pesticides by UHPLC-MS/MS and GC-MS/MS
method_identification.issuing_agency: United States Department of Agriculture, Food Safety and Inspection Service

sample_information.partNature: muscle tissue, liquid egg products, and powdered egg
sample_information.scientificNames: bovine, caprine, equine, ovine, porcine, poultry, fish of the order Siluriformes (catfish)
sample_information.other_information: This method is the laboratory procedure for screening 106 pesticides from 10 pesticide classes.

sample_preparation.centrifugation_conditions: 1) Remove samples from freezer and centrifuge at 3000 RCF for 8 min. 2) Centrifuge the extract while frozen for 3.5 min at 1050 RCF.
sample_preparation.homogenization_method: Grind tissue in blender or vertical cutter-mixer until homogeneous.
sample_preparation.shipping_details: Samples must be kept cold before and during shipping to the laboratory.
sample_preparation.extraction_solvent_volume: 30 mL of ethyl acetate for 20.0 g of muscle tissue, 5.0 g of liquid egg, or 2.5 g of powdered egg.
sample_preparation.extraction_time: 1 minute on shaker, followed by 5 minutes vigorous shaking.
sample_preparation.concentration_process: Concentrate the extract under nitrogen in a 65 ± 5 °C water bath.
sample_preparation.spe_details: A solid phase extraction (SPE) column by adding approximately 2 g of anhydrous MgSO4 to the top of the 1000 mg C18 SPE Columns.
sample_preparation.cleanup_method: A multi-step cleanup involving QuEChERS salts, freezing-induced protein precipitation, and SPE is performed. For the LC-MS/MS specific cleanup, 1 mL of extract is treated with QuEChERS salts (150 mg MgSO4 & 50 mg Primary Secondary Amine (PSA)) in a micro-centrifuge tube.
sample_preparation.extract_storage_conditions: If stopping overnight, samples should be capped and stored at ≤ -20 °C. The extracts are stable for 24 hours.
sample_preparation.other_information: The general sample preparation involves extraction with ethyl acetate and QuEChERS salts, two separate freezing precipitation steps (-20°C and -70°C), concentration, and a C18 SPE cleanup. The final 2 mL extract is then aliquoted for specific UHPLC and GC cleanups.

chromatography_conditions.injection_volume: 1 µL for muscle samples, 2 µL for egg samples
chromatography_conditions.wash_solvent: Weak Wash: 10% methanol in water. Strong Wash: 0.5% formic acid in 1:1:1:1 acetonitrile: methanol: isopropanol: water.
chromatography_conditions.column_model: UPLC HSS T3 (pre-column: VanGuard Pre-column UPLC HSS T3)
chromatography_conditions.internal_standards_added: Internal standard spiking solution containing Trichloronate and Ethoprophos.
chromatography_conditions.mobile_phase_composition: Phase A: 5 mM ammonium acetate in 0.1% formic acid in water (v/v); Phase B: 0.1% formic acid in methanol (v/v)
chromatography_conditions.other_information: Run time: 12 min; Column manager temperature: 50 °C.

mass_spectrometry_conditions.mass_resolution: LM1 Resolution 3.5, HM 1 Resolution: 15, LM 2 Resolution: 12.50, HM 2 Resolution: 12.50
mass_spectrometry_conditions.other_information: Desolvation Temperature: 350 °C; Collision Gas Flow: 0.25 mL/min; Extractor: 3.0 V. MRM transitions for 69 compounds are defined in Table 14.

sample_information.partNature: muscle tissue, liquid egg products, and powdered egg
sample_information.scientificNames: bovine, caprine, equine, ovine, porcine, poultry, fish of the order Siluriformes (catfish)
sample_information.other_information: This method is the laboratory procedure for screening 106 pesticides from 10 pesticide classes.

sample_preparation.centrifugation_conditions: 1) Remove samples from freezer and centrifuge at 3000 RCF for 8 min. 2) Centrifuge the extract while frozen for 3.5 min at 1050 RCF.
sample_preparation.homogenization_method: Grind tissue in blender or vertical cutter-mixer until homogeneous.
sample_preparation.shipping_details: Samples must be kept cold before and during shipping to the laboratory.
sample_preparation.extraction_solvent_volume: 30 mL of ethyl acetate for 20.0 g of muscle tissue, 5.0 g of liquid egg, or 2.5 g of powdered egg.
sample_preparation.extraction_time: 1 minute on shaker, followed by 5 minutes vigorous shaking.
sample_preparation.concentration_process: Evaporate the sample under nitrogen in a 65 ± 5 °C water bath.
sample_preparation.spe_details: A solid phase extraction (SPE) column by adding approximately 2 g of anhydrous MgSO4 to the top of the 1000 mg C18 SPE Columns.
sample_preparation.cleanup_method: A multi-step cleanup involving QuEChERS salts, freezing-induced protein precipitation, and SPE is performed. For the GC-MS/MS specific cleanup, the remaining extract is passed through a 500 mg PSA SPE column and eluted with acetone/toluene. The eluate is evaporated and reconstituted in toluene.
sample_preparation.extract_storage_conditions: If stopping overnight, samples should be capped and stored at ≤ -20 °C. The extracts are stable for 24 hours.
sample_preparation.other_information: The general sample preparation involves extraction with ethyl acetate and QuEChERS salts, two separate freezing precipitation steps (-20°C and -70°C), concentration, and a C18 SPE cleanup. The final 2 mL extract is then aliquoted for specific UHPLC and GC cleanups.

chromatography_conditions.injection_volume: 1 µL for muscle samples, 2 µL for egg
chromatography_conditions.column_length: 15 m (two columns are used in series)
chromatography_conditions.internal_standards_added: Internal standard spiking solution containing Trichloronate and Ethoprophos.
chromatography_conditions.flow_rate: Column 1 Flow Rate: 1.4 mL/min; Column 2 Flow Rate: 1.2 mL/min
chromatography_conditions.gradient_profile: Temperature Program: Initial temp 60 °C (hold 1 min), ramp to 120 °C at 40 °C/min, then ramp to 292°C at 5 °C/min.
chromatography_conditions.other_information: Total Run time: 36.9 min; Post-run time: 2 min.

mass_spectrometry_conditions.other_information: Detector EMV: 1352 V; Collision Gas: Nitrogen @ 1.5 mL/Min; Transfer line temperature: 300 °C. MRM transitions for 37 compounds are defined in Table 15.

method_identification.method_name: Food analysis - Determination of pesticide residues by LC-MS/MS - Tandem mass spectrometric parameters
method_identification.other_information: This is a Technical Report (TR) drawn up by the Technical Committee CEN/TC 275 'Food analysis - Horizontal methods'. [4] The secretariat is held by DIN. This report lists mass spectrometric parameters for applying European Standards such as prEN 15637 and prEN 15662. [4, 5]

sample_information.other_information: The method is intended for use with European Standards for determining pesticide residues in foods of plant origin, such as prEN 15637 (methanol extraction) and prEN 15662 (QuEChERS method). [5]

sample_preparation.cleanup_method: Clean up using diatomaceous earth or dispersive SPE. [5]
sample_preparation.other_information: The document refers to sample preparation methods like prEN 15637 (methanol extraction and clean up using diatomaceous earth) and prEN 15662 (QuEChERS method: acetonitrile extraction/partitioning by dispersive SPE), but does not detail the sample preparation steps for the presented parameters. [5]

chromatography_conditions.mobile_phase_composition: Mobile phase A: Methanol/Water 2+8 (V/V) with 5 mmol/l ammonium formate; Mobile phase B: Methanol/Water 9+1 (V/V) with 5 mmol/l ammonium formate.
chromatography_conditions.gradient_profile: Linear: 0 min, 0% B; 11 min, 100% B; 23 min, 100% B; 25 min, 0% B; 36 min, 0% B (equilibration time).

mass_spectrometry_conditions.mass_resolution: Resolution MS 1: unit; Resolution MS 2: unit
mass_spectrometry_conditions.other_information: Curtain gas: nitrogen, 35 psi (241 kPa); Collision gas: nitrogen, 2 arbitrary units; Dwell time: 25 ms; Focusing potential: 360 V. For API 3000® or API 4000® instruments, the declustering potential (DP) values should be increased by 20 V. Analyte-specific parameters (Q1 Mass, Q3 Mass, Declustering potential, Collision energy) for 497 analytes are provided in the document tables.

method_identification.method_name: Foodstuffs - Determination of pesticide residues by GC-MS/MS - Tandem mass spectrometric parameters
method_identification.other_information: This is a Technical Report (TR), not a European Standard (EN). It was prepared by Technical Committee CEN/TC 275 “Food analysis - Horizontal methods”. The document is issued by a European organization, not a single country, representing the national standards bodies of Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, Former Yugoslav Republic of Macedonia, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, Turkey and United Kingdom.

sample_information.description: 样品信息: 关于被测样品的描述信息。
sample_information.other_information: This report covers the analysis of pesticide residues in foodstuffs as defined in European Standards EN 1528 (Fatty food, including PCBs), EN 12393 (Foods of plant origin), and EN 15662 (Foods of plant origin).

sample_preparation.description: 样品制备: 样品前处理的完整流程和参数。
sample_preparation.other_information: The report does not detail sample preparation but references methods like EN 15662, which uses the QuEChERS method (acetonitrile extraction/partitioning). The general procedure involves extraction from a homogenized sample and subsequent clean-up.

chromatography_conditions.description: 色谱条件: 色谱分离的完整条件和参数。
chromatography_conditions.other_information: GC parameters and retention times are not described in this Technical Report. The document suggests referring to CEN/TR 16468 "Food analysis - Determination of pesticide residues by GC-MS - Retention times, mass spectrometric parameters and detector response information" for this information.

mass_spectrometry_conditions.description: 质谱条件: 质谱检测的完整条件和参数。
mass_spectrometry_conditions.ms_instrument_manufacturer: Agilent Technologies, Bruker Daltonics, Thermo Scientific, Varian Inc., Waters Corporation
mass_spectrometry_conditions.ms_instrument_model: Agilent 7000 Series, Bruker SCION TQ, Thermo Quantum, Varian 1200 (L), Waters Quattro micro
mass_spectrometry_conditions.other_information: All MS/MS transitions were obtained with electron impact ionization at 70 eV. The report provides a comprehensive list (Table 2) of analyte-specific MS/MS transitions (precursor ion → product ion) and associated collision energy (CE) categories (low, medium, high) for a large number of pesticides. The voltage ranges for these CE categories are defined for various instrument models in Table 1.

method_identification.method_name: 食品安全国家标准 果蔬汁和果酒中512种农药及相关化学品残留量的测定 液相色谱-质谱法
method_identification.issuing_agency: 中华人民共和国国家卫生和计划生育委员会, 中华人民共和国农业部, 国家食品药品监督管理总局

sample_information.partNature: fruit juice, vegetable juice, fruit wine
sample_information.other_information: 本标准规定了橙汁、苹果汁、葡萄汁、白菜汁、胡萝卜汁、干酒、半干酒、半甜酒、甜酒中512种农药及相关化学品残留量液相色谱-质谱测定方法。本标准适用于定性鉴别及490种农药的定量测定，其它果蔬汁、果酒可参照执行。

sample_preparation.tissue_processing_method: 浓缩果蔬汁样品，将取得的全部原始样品倒入洁净的搪瓷混样桶内，充分搅拌混匀。
sample_preparation.homogenization_method: 在涡旋混合器上涡旋2min，振荡1min，再振荡2min。
sample_preparation.concentration_process: 在40℃水浴中旋转浓缩至约0.5mL，于35℃下氮气吹干。
sample_preparation.spe_details: Waters Sep-Pak Vac 氨基固相萃取柱 (6mL, 1g)。用5mL乙腈-甲苯溶液预洗柱，用25mL乙腈-甲苯溶液洗脱。
sample_preparation.cleanup_method: 在SPE柱中加入约2cm高无水硫酸钠进行净化；净化液通过0.2µm微孔滤膜过滤。
sample_preparation.other_information: 称取15g试样（果酒为15mL）。提取过程中依次加入1.5g无水醋酸钠和6g无水硫酸镁。

chromatography_conditions.mobile_phase_composition: 流动相A: 0.1%甲酸水; 流动相B: 乙腈
chromatography_conditions.other_information: 柱温: 40℃。此配置用于A、B、C、D、E、F组农药的测定。

mass_spectrometry_conditions.other_information: 雾化气: 氮气; 雾化气压力: 0.28MPa; 监测离子对、碰撞气能量和源内碎裂电压参见附录B。

sample_information.partNature: fruit juice, vegetable juice, fruit wine
sample_information.other_information: 本标准规定了橙汁、苹果汁、葡萄汁、白菜汁、胡萝卜汁、干酒、半干酒、半甜酒、甜酒中512种农药及相关化学品残留量液相色谱-质谱测定方法。本标准适用于定性鉴别及490种农药的定量测定，其它果蔬汁、果酒可参照执行。

sample_preparation.tissue_processing_method: 浓缩果蔬汁样品，将取得的全部原始样品倒入洁净的搪瓷混样桶内，充分搅拌混匀。
sample_preparation.homogenization_method: 在涡旋混合器上涡旋2min，振荡1min，再振荡2min。
sample_preparation.concentration_process: 在40℃水浴中旋转浓缩至约0.5mL，于35℃下氮气吹干。
sample_preparation.spe_details: Waters Sep-Pak Vac 氨基固相萃取柱 (6mL, 1g)。用5mL乙腈-甲苯溶液预洗柱，用25mL乙腈-甲苯溶液洗脱。
sample_preparation.cleanup_method: 在SPE柱中加入约2cm高无水硫酸钠进行净化；净化液通过0.2µm微孔滤膜过滤。
sample_preparation.other_information: 称取15g试样（果酒为15mL）。提取过程中依次加入1.5g无水醋酸钠和6g无水硫酸镁。

chromatography_conditions.mobile_phase_composition: 流动相A: 5mmol/L 乙酸铵水; 流动相B: 乙腈
chromatography_conditions.other_information: 柱温: 40℃。此配置用于G组农药的测定。

mass_spectrometry_conditions.other_information: 雾化气: 氮气; 雾化气压力: 0.28 MPa; 监测离子对、碰撞气能量和源内碎裂电压参见附录B。

method_identification.method_name: 牛奶和奶粉中493种农药及相关化学品残留量的测定 液相色谱-串联质谱法
method_identification.issuing_agency: 中华人民共和国国家质量监督检验检疫总局, 中国国家标准化管理委员会
method_identification.other_information: 本标准起草单位:中华人民共和国秦皇岛出入境检验检疫局、山东农业大学。本标准主要起草人:庞国芳、郑军红、范春林、王明林、李岩。

sample_information.other_information: 本标准适用于牛奶中482种农药及相关化学品的定性鉴别,441种农药及相关化学品的定量测定;适用于奶粉中481种农药及相关化学品的定性鉴别,427种农药及相关化学品的定量测定。

sample_preparation.centrifugation_conditions: 奶粉: 4200 r/min, 5 min; 牛奶: 4200 r/min, 8 min
sample_preparation.homogenization_method: 奶粉: 均质器, 15000 r/min, 1 min; 牛奶: 振荡器, 剧烈振荡10 min
sample_preparation.pre_extraction_storage_temp: 奶粉: 常温; 牛奶: 0℃~4℃
sample_preparation.extraction_solvent_volume: 奶粉: 20 mL / 3.0 g; 牛奶: 20 mL / 10 mL
sample_preparation.extraction_time: 奶粉: 1 min; 牛奶: 10 min
sample_preparation.concentration_process: 于40℃水浴旋转蒸发至约1 mL, 随后于45℃下用氮气吹干
sample_preparation.spe_details: SPE柱: ENVITM-18 (SUPELCO), 12 mL, 2000 mg; 活化: 10 mL 乙腈; 洗脱: 10 mL 乙腈
sample_preparation.cleanup_method: 样品提取物经0.2 µm微孔滤膜过滤
sample_preparation.extract_storage_conditions: 基质混合标准工作溶液应现用现配
sample_preparation.other_information: 提取过程区分奶粉和牛奶。奶粉: 称取3.0 g样品,加入20 mL乙腈和4 g硫酸镁进行提取。牛奶: 量取10 mL样品, 加入20 mL乙腈、4 g硫酸镁和1 g氯化钠进行提取。两次提取，合并上清液。

chromatography_conditions.mobile_phase_composition: A: 0.1%甲酸水溶液, B: 乙腈
chromatography_conditions.other_information: 柱温: 40 ℃。此条件适用于A、B、C、D、E、F组农药的分析。

mass_spectrometry_conditions.other_information: 雾化气: 氮气; 干燥气流速: 10 L/min; 监测离子对、碰撞气能量和源内碎裂电压参见附录B。

sample_information.other_information: 本标准适用于牛奶中482种农药及相关化学品的定性鉴别,441种农药及相关化学品的定量测定;适用于奶粉中481种农药及相关化学品的定性鉴别,427种农药及相关化学品的定量测定。

sample_preparation.centrifugation_conditions: 奶粉: 4200 r/min, 5 min; 牛奶: 4200 r/min, 8 min
sample_preparation.homogenization_method: 奶粉: 均质器, 15000 r/min, 1 min; 牛奶: 振荡器, 剧烈振荡10 min
sample_preparation.pre_extraction_storage_temp: 奶粉: 常温; 牛奶: 0℃~4℃
sample_preparation.extraction_solvent_volume: 奶粉: 20 mL / 3.0 g; 牛奶: 20 mL / 10 mL
sample_preparation.extraction_time: 奶粉: 1 min; 牛奶: 10 min
sample_preparation.concentration_process: 于40℃水浴旋转蒸发至约1 mL, 随后于45℃下用氮气吹干
sample_preparation.spe_details: SPE柱: ENVITM-18 (SUPELCO), 12 mL, 2000 mg; 活化: 10 mL 乙腈; 洗脱: 10 mL 乙腈
sample_preparation.cleanup_method: 样品提取物经0.2 µm微孔滤膜过滤后进行分析
sample_preparation.extract_storage_conditions: 基质混合标准工作溶液应现用现配
sample_preparation.other_information: 提取过程区分奶粉和牛奶。奶粉: 称取3.0 g样品,加入20 mL乙腈和4 g硫酸镁进行提取。牛奶: 量取10 mL样品, 加入20 mL乙腈、4 g硫酸镁和1 g氯化钠进行提取。两次提取，合并上清液。

chromatography_conditions.mobile_phase_composition: A: 5 mmol/L乙酸铵水溶液, B: 乙腈
chromatography_conditions.other_information: 柱温: 40 ℃。此条件适用于G组农药的分析。

mass_spectrometry_conditions.other_information: 雾化气: 氮气; 干燥气流速: 10 L/min; 监测离子对、碰撞气能量和源内碎裂电压参见附录B。
